title: Hello Junglist!
descText: I'm an American living and working in Germany. My interests range from filmmaking to music theory. With a variety of experience in different multimedia disciplines, including MC'ing. You can usually catch me grooving alongside some of the coolest DJs in and around the 'Mittelfranken' region.
logoAlt: A terminal style cursor blinks as it spells out the words 'MC' and 'SCRIPT'. With no I in script.
